Sequence Information.Peptide Name: GLRC-3 (Synthetic AMPs, variant of GLR-19, Arg-rich; Leu-rich; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (84.21%) toGLR-19. R: 37%; L: 37%.Chemical modification:  one disulfide bond C6-C14.Activity: inhibited HSV-2MS in Vero cells (EC50 6.37 ug/ml); HSV-2MS in Vero cells (EC50 15 ug/ml). E. coli (MIC 7.5 uM); B.subtilis (MIC >120 uM).Toxicity: TC50 18.5 ug/ml in CEM-SS cells.
Literature Information.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Buckheit RW Jr. 2011
Literature Information.Reference: J AIDS Clinic Res S2:003. doi:10.4172/2155-6113.S2-003.Wang HIV screen project
Literature Information.Title:
De Novo Design of Antiviral and Antibacterial Peptides with 
Varying Loop Structures
